alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 2:27PM EDT until August 04 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Centre County in central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 227 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Monument, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Carroll, Woodward, Lamar, Mill Hall, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, Blanchard, McElhattan, Rebersburg and Mackeyville. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Bellefonte and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 171 to 195. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
